title: TotalBoat Rust Primer Converter (QUART) | Metal Treatment Stops Rust For Professional Repairs
features: STOP RUST IN ITS TRACKS: TotalBoat Rust Primer is a metal treatment that converts rust into an inert substance, leaving surfaces ready for primer or paint
WIDE RANGE OF USES: Phosphoric acid-based rust converter is ideal for rusted metal on cars, campers, trucks, trailers, bikes, boat trailers, outdoor metal railings, steel doors, rebar, tools & more
SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE: Restore, Preserve, and Protect metal from further rust and corrosion. Use on rusted or new metal to seal out air & moisture. Using it on new metal ensures maximum paint adhesion
EASY TO APPLY: Brush or spray on iron, steel, or stainless steel. Just use a wire brush first to remove any flaky rust or loose paint, apply Rust Primer & let it dry overnight
UNMATCHED COVERAGE: Water-thin formula provides coverage of over 500 sq. ft. per gallon. Available in both quart and gallon sizes. For DIY & Professional repairs
description: TotalBoat Rust Primer converts rust into an inert substance, stopping rust in its tracks and inhibiting new rust spots. Use it on both rusted or new metal. Using it on new metal ensures superior paint adhesion. Our rust remover is a phosphoric acid-based metal treatment ideal for rusted cars, bikes, boat trailers, campers, farm equipment, tractors, machinery, motorcycles tools, steel doors, steel garage doors, outdoor metal railings, pipe, and other metal surfaces made of steel, stainless, or cast iron. Stop rust right away and make sure it never returns without the need for expensive, time consuming, tedious sandblasting, grinding, or scraping. It's incredibly easy to use. First, use a wire brush to remove loose scale, rust flakes, grease, dirt, and paint. Then brush this thin metal treatment / rust inhibitor on and let it dry overnight. The rusty metal turns black to indicate the chemical change has happened. This means rust has been transformed into an inert state. Brush off any white powdery residue the next day. The surface will be ready for primer. Available in both quart and gallon sizes. Compare to Skybrite or Skyco Ospho, Corroseal Rust Converter, Krud Kutter Rustex, Rust-oleum Rust Reformer, VHT Rust Converter, Gempler's RCQ, MROChem Black Star, CRC Rust Converter, Rust Bullet ProPLUS, Naval Jelly, POR-15, Star Brite Rust Eater, Permatex Rust Dissolver, Evapo Rust, Loctite Extend Neutralizer, Eastwood Fast Converter, and Plastikote.
